34 
35 import os
36 import sys
37 
38 PKG = os.path.split(os.getcwd())[1]
39 print("Creating pydev project for package '%s'" % PKG)
40 import roslib # noqa: E402
41 roslib.load_manifest(PKG)
42 
43 pathlist = '\n'.join(
44  ['<path>%s</path>' % path for path in sys.path if os.path.exists(path)])
45 
46 pydev_project = """<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
47 <?eclipse-pydev version="1.0"?>
48 
49 <pydev_project>
50 <pydev_property name="org.python.pydev.PYTHON_PROJECT_INTERPRETER">Default</pydev_property>
51 <pydev_property name="org.python.pydev.PYTHON_PROJECT_VERSION">python 2.6</pydev_property>
52 <pydev_pathproperty name="org.python.pydev.PROJECT_EXTERNAL_SOURCE_PATH">
53 %s
54 </pydev_pathproperty>
55 </pydev_project>
56 """ % pathlist
57 
58 print('Writing .pydevproject, adding %d modules' % len(sys.path))
59 f = open('.pydevproject', 'w')
60 f.write(pydev_project)
61 f.close()
